summary.overview: This JCL job establishes a Generation Data Group (GDG) infrastructure for managing transaction report files in the CardDemo application. It creates a systematic approach to maintain up to 10 historical versions of transaction reports with automatic cleanup of older versions.
business_functions: Creates Generation Data Group structure for transaction report file management
Establishes 10-generation limit for maintaining historical transaction report versions
Enables automatic version control and cleanup for transaction reporting data

REPTFILE.jcl.program_overview: IBM utility for defining and managing Generation Data Groups

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Report Files (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANREPT)
datasource_summary.function: Stores transaction report files with generation management, maintaining up to 10 versions of transaction reports for historical tracking and version control

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
